mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Kelley, Benjamin F. to Lockwood, Jonathan H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Kelley, Benjamin F.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: J.H. Lockwood, Wheeling Sept 13 1861. By Telegraph from Grafton " 13 1861. If Captain Fishers Company can be spared from Camp Carlile have clothed & fully equipped & then ask the Governor to have it sent up to me B.F. Kelley, Brig Genl 27Gr86pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Kelley, Benjamin F.
Grafton, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Lockwood, Jonathan H.
